mapper.select: SELECT company.ENTERPRISE_ID, company.COMPANY_ID, company.ADMIN_NAME, company.ADMIN_PASSWORD FROM hm_crm_outcall_company company WHERE company.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT company.ENTERPRISE_ID, company.COMPANY_ID, company.ADMIN_NAME, company.ADMIN_PASSWORD, rela.CNO, rela.STAFF_ID, rela.ID, rela.BIND_TEL FROM hm_crm_outcall_company company LEFT JOIN hm_crm_outcall_rela rela ON company.ENTERPRISE_ID = rela.ENTERPRISE_ID WHERE company.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND rela.STAFF_ID = #{staffId}
SELECT rela.STAFF_ID, staff.NICKNAME, staff.COMPANYID FROM hm_crm_outcall_rela rela LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff ON rela.STAFF_ID = staff.ID WHERE rela.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
SELECT rela.COMPANY_ID, rela.STAFF_ID, rela.ENTERPRISE_ID, rela.BIND_TEL, rela.CNO FROM hm_crm_outcall_rela rela WHERE rela.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND rela.STAFF_ID = #{staffId}
